pullRequest.title: Add option to not colorize notification
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is it?

 Feature (user facing)

Description of the changes in your PR


Add option to not colorize notifications
Setting is located under notifcation

Fixes the following issue(s)


closes #4488

APK testing

updated after rebase
app-debug.zip
Due diligence

 I read the contribution guidelines.

nodes.bodyText:
Let's keep consistency

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <string name="colorize_notification_key" translatable="false">colorize_notification_key</string>
          
          
            
                <string name="notification_colorize_key" translatable="false">notification_colorize_key</string>

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <string name="colorize_notification_title">Colorize notifications</string>
          
          
            
                <string name="colorize_notification_summary">Use Androids feature to set the color of the notification according to the main color of the thumbnail</string>
          
          
            
                <string name="notification_colorize_title">Colorize notification</string>
          
          
            
                <string name="notification_colorize_summary">Have Android cusomize the notification's color according to the main color in the thumbnail (note that this is not available on all devices)</string>
          
      
    
    
  

Also maybe add a note about the fact that some Android versions and UIs never colorize the notification.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -71,6 +71,8 @@
     <string name="notification_action_shuffle">Shuffle</string>
     <string name="notification_action_buffering">Buffering</string>
     <string name="notification_action_nothing">Nothing</string>
+    <string name="colorize_notification_title">Colorize notifications</string>
+    <string name="colorize_notification_summary">Use Androids feature to set the color of the notification according to the main color of the thumbnail</string>

nodes.bodyText:
While you are at it, could you change the default color before media starts to play to a darker gray? dark_background_color should do

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            .setColor(ContextCompat.getColor(player.context, R.color.gray))
          
          
            
                            .setColor(ContextCompat.getColor(player.context, R.color.dark_background_color))
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -121,6 +121,9 @@ synchronized void createNotificationIfNeededAndUpdate(final VideoPlayerImpl play
                 .setShowWhen(false)
                 .setSmallIcon(R.drawable.ic_newpipe_triangle_white)
                 .setColor(ContextCompat.getColor(player.context, R.color.gray))
